* Mix-Use Residential Development
* Residential Dwellings

* Light commercial (Factory/Warehouse)

We strive to deliver high-quality design solutions that not only meet, but exceed our clients' expectations and needs

category_items.section_description:
At IPT Creative Ltd, we are a team of qualified architectural technologists who specialize in providing multidisciplinary BIM documentation services. We break down and analyze the design concept to determine how the building can be constructed and function effectively over its lifespan, all while aligning with our clients' expectations and design brief.

Our expertise includes, but not limited to:

* Mix-Used Residential Development (Apartments + Retail)
* High-end architectural House (over two million NZD)
* Schools
* Hospitality
* Factories and Warehouses
* Swimming pools and facilities

We understand the importance of clear communication and planning in the design process and with our multidisciplinary approach, we ensure that our clients' projects are completed successfully and efficiently, by providing the best BIM solutions.

category_items.section_description:
At IPT Creative Ltd, we understand the importance of clear communication and planning in the design process. That's why we help our clients define clear Exchange Information Requirements (EIR) from the beginning of a project. We also review pre-BIM execution plans during the tender stage and assist the appointed party in securing BIM execution plan content and delivery milestones that align with our clients' expectations and goals.

We have extensive experience with a variety of BIM workflows, and we are able to provide the following services:

1. Model performance review and check
2. Establishment of a Common Data Environment (CDE)
3. Model Coordination on our IPT Coordination Platform, including information exchange using BCF (BIM Collaboration Format)

Our goal is to ensure that our clients' projects are completed successfully and efficiently, by providing the best BIM solutions.

At IPT Creative Ltd, we believe in working closely with our clients and their nominated survey team to provide the highest level of service. We specialize in applying "H" BIM process to existing buildings, whether they are historical monuments or simple dwellings from the 1950s. By creating digital asset information, we help our clients to support future maintenance and operation which bring huge value to them.

We understand the importance of preserving historical buildings, and our team of experts has the knowledge and experience to apply the latest technology to support the preservation and restoration of these structures. By providing detailed digital asset information, we help our clients to make informed decisions about the maintenance and operation of their buildings.

At IPT Creative Ltd, we understand the importance of effective communication and problem-solving on construction sites. We develop digital construction models to help constructors solve critical on-site issues and eliminate operational risks. Our services include site and services pipework set out, 3D shop drawings, and post-construction as-built model delivery.

Our services include:

* Builder Layout Drawings
* Shop Drawings (Plumbing, HVAC, Electrical, etc)
* Passive Fire Penetration Quantification Study
* Model Auditing and Review
* Services Clash Detection
* As-built model

We strive to provide our clients with the most accurate and up-to-date information to ensure smooth construction process and minimize errors and delays. Our digital construction models are designed to help constructors achieve their goals efficiently and effectively.
